bibl.title: Aeschylus' Dictyulci. An attempt at reconstruction of a satyric drama.
bibl.seg: Werre-de Haas M., Aeschylus' Dictyulci. An attempt at reconstruction of a satyric drama. (Papyrologica Lugduno-Batava. X.)

C.R. par Zd.K. Vysoky, LF 86 (1963) pp. 158-159. - J.C. Kamerbeek, Mnemosyne 4e s., 16 (1963) pp. 181-182. - D.N. Levin, CW 56 (1962) pp. 47-48. - H.J. Mette, Gnomon 35 (1963) pp. 15-17. - R. Weil, RPhil 3e s., 38 (1964) pp. 126-127. - F. Jouan, RBPhil 41 (1963) pp. 1337-1338.
